text:
Hello group.
I'm struggling with changing navigation in the header. I changed in settings, but it is not showing in the header global module.
I looked in HTML+HubL but I can't find anything but style modules.
However I found some field groups that contain some text items, but they contain the same word.
As I already built a header in Elementor Pro is there any way to export it into HubL and switch the existing one?
Also, I have a mess with different types of templates inside Marketing Pro. One type of templates are line coded, other are drag-and-drop. When I asked HS support, they said that the only way is to build new landing pages and define template.
The goal here is to unify header and footer as a global modules  for all pages and templates, and put landing page templates to be drag-and-drop.
If you need more details or to visualise my problem, let me know.

Thanks for your thoughts. (edited)
